extDescription.message: بزرگنمایی عکس/فیلم در تمام وب سایت های دلخواه (فیس بوک، آمازون، و غیره). به سادگی ماوس خود را روی تصویر حرکت دهید و آن را بزرگ ببید.

optSupportedImageFormats.description: [options] Page section for supported image formats

optSupportedVideoFormats.description: [options] Page section for supported video formats

optSupportedAudioFormats.description: [options] Page section for supported audio formats

optSectionImportExportSettingsTooltip.message: Press export to get a string of your current settings. Press import to load your pasted settings
optSectionImportExportSettingsTooltip.description: [options] Tooltip for input and export options

optImportExportTextArea.description: [options] Placeholder for import and export text area

optButtonImportSettings.description: [options] Import a save string from the textarea

optButtonExportSettings.description: [options] Export a save string into the textarea

optImport.description: [options] Notification after successful import to options

optImportFailed.description: [options] Notification after failed import to options

optSectionFAQ.description: [options] Page section for Frequently Asked Questions

optFAQ_Q1.message: I edited some options, but i see no changes.

optFAQ_Q2.message: I want to hide the mouse cursor on zoomed image or video.

optFAQ_A2_1.message: In Options -> General -> Delays, activate "Hide mouse cursor"

optFAQ_Q3.message: I need HoverZoom+ to be active for some sites only.

optFAQ_A3_1.message: E.g. to activate HoverZoom+ on DeviantArt.com & 1X.com:

optFAQ_A3_3.message: Add DeviantArt.com & 1X.com to list of URLs (not case-sensitive)

optFAQ_Q4.message: I want to zoom an image or video to its original size even if larger than screen.

optFAQ_A4_1.message: Hover over an image or video then lock it on screen (default action key: "L")

optFAQ_A4_2.message: Image or video is now displayed fullsize. You can zoom in or out using mousewheel.

optFAQ_A5_1.message: Sometimes action keys seem to be broken, this usually happens when page has lost focus.

optFAQ_A5_2.message: Just click anywhere on page to regain focus.

optFAQ_A5_3.message: In Options -> Advanced, you can activate "Enable Action Keys focus overlay message", so you'll get a warning message when focus is lost.

optFAQ_Q6.message: Some videos do not play when opened from sites other than original ones.

optFAQ_A6_1.message: e.g: Dailymotion videos play in dailymotion.com, but not in Google search results.

optFAQ_A6_2.message: This is due to CORS restrictions, to lift them:

optFAQ_A6_3.message: In Options -> Advanced, activate "Allow rewrite of headers for HTTP(S) request or response"

optFAQ_Q7.message: I hover an image or video but sometimes nothing happens!

optFAQ_A7.message: Scroll down or click anywhere on page to wake up HoverZoom+!

optActionKeyDescription.message: If a key is set, HoverZoom+ will be active only when this key is held down.

optCloseKeyDescription.message: Press this key to close zoomed image or video.

optHideKeyDescription.message: Holding this key down hides the zoomed image or video. Use it when the picture hides elements that are also displayed on mouseover.

optBanKeyDescription.message: Holding this key down adds the zoomed image or video to ban list. Use it when you do not want an image or video to be zoomed again on this page.

optOpenImageInWindowKeyTitle.message: باز کردن تصویر در پنجره جدید

optOpenImageInWindowKeyDescription.message: Press this key to open the image or video you are currently viewing in a new window. Press this key again to close the window.

optOpenImageInTabKeyTitle.message: باز کردن تصویر در زبانه جدید

optOpenImageInTabKeyDescription.message: Press this key to open the image or video you are currently viewing in a new tab. Press this key again to close the tab. Shift+key opens the image in a background tab.

optLockImageKeyDescription.message: Press this key to lock the image or video in the center of the page, allowing you to zoom and pan around. Press close key or click outside the image to unlock.

optSaveImageKeyDescription.message: Press this key to save the image or video you are currently viewing. (Requires 'Enable saving media with action key' to be checked)

optFullZoomKeyDescription.message: زمانی که این کلید را بزنید، تصویر با استفاده از تمام فضای نمایش داده می شود. مفید برای تصاویر با وضوح بالا تنها.

optCopyImageKeyDescription.message: When this key is pressed, the image is copied into the clipboard.

optCopyImageUrlKeyDescription.message: When this key is pressed, the image's or video's URL is copied into the clipboard.

optPrevImgKeyDescription.message: فشار این کلید به مشاهده تصویر قبلی در گالری.

optNextImgKeyDescription.message: فشار این کلید برای مشاهده تصویر بعدی در گالری.

optFlipImageKeyDescription.message: Press this key to alternately flip image vertically and horizontally. Handy for reading texts & logos in mirrored images or videos.

optrotateImageKeyDescription.message: Press this key to rotate image.

optFooterSourceCode.description: [options] Source code link in page footer

optFooterReportIssue.description: [options] Report a bug link in page footer

optFooterVersionCopyright.description: [options] Copyright and version number in page footer

msgClickPageToPlayVideo.message: click anywhere on the page then hover again
msgClickPageToPlayVideo.description: User must interact with the document first to play video: https://goo.gl/xX8pDD

msgClickPageToActivateActionKeys.message: click anywhere on the page to activate Action Keys
msgClickPageToActivateActionKeys.description: Action keys are active only if page is focused
